import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function MemberForm() { const [member, setMember] = useState({ name: '', email: '', role: ''}); const [memberList] = useState([]) function handleChange(event) { const updatedMember= {...member, [event.target.name]: event.target.value}; setMember(updatedMember); } function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); console.log('Member Info: ', member) memberList.appendChild(member); setMember({name: '', email: '', role: ''}) } return (
Add a Team Member
) }
